n=input()
for x in range(n):
    a={}
    sum=0
    t=input()
    for y in range(t):
        b=raw_input()
        c=len(b)
        d=b[0:c-1]
        e=b[c-1]
        if(d not in a.keys()):
            if(e=='+'):
                a[d]=1
            else:
                a[d]=-1
        elif(e=='+'):
            a[d]=1
        elif(e=='-'):
            a[d]=-1
    for y in a.values():
        sum+=y
    print sum
